Absolut tillväxt för anrikt bruk – dryckesjättarnas flaskor kommer från Limmared
I Limmared med färre än 2000 invånare tillverkas en halv miljard glasförpackningar per år. ”Intresset för glas har ökat”, säger Bo Nilsson, vd för fabriken som levererar flaskor till bryggerijättar som Spendrups, Carlsberg och inte minst Absolut Vodka.  
02 Nov 2019, 12:56 by Åsa Johansson

Sérgio Guizé reveals nickname that he earned from his wife because of Gum: 'Terrible'
02 Nov 2019, 12:06 by Aurilane Alves
The soap opera A Dona do Pedaço is being a big highlight of Rede Globo, whose main actors are Juliana Paes (Maria da Paes) and Marcos Palmeira (Amadeu). Another character that has also stood out since the beginning of his participation is Chiclete, played by actor Sérgio Guizé, who is being instrumental in the 21h plot.
Gum is one of the villains of Walcyr Carrasco's plot, having been hired to kill blogger Vivi Guedes, whom he later fell in love with and hooked up a romance. Despite the bad reputation of the character of Giza, the wife of the actor is not caring much about the evil of the character, having even nicknamed her husband with the same name.

publicity
Sergio was recently invited to participate in the GShow program and gave a lively interview, talking about his character and life alongside Bianca Bin, with whom he is married this past year.
In the interview, Sérgio confessed that, after the soap opera, the woman gave him an affectionate nickname: “She calls me my bubblegum. Oh, Bianca is terrible, ”said the artist jokingly, and ended up laughing at the situation. He also said that the fact that his wife has the same profession has helped a lot, since the famous helps him with the work.

publicity
Recently, some netizens have even started rumors about a possible relationship between Sérgio and Paola Oliveira, his romantic match in A Dona do Pedaço, which has also been a hit in the soap opera. Despite the rumors, the actor guarantees that there is only friendship in their relationship.
